Header: Another accomplice of ‘Kanchipani Imran’ arrested in Kotahena
Content: Colombo (News 1st): Police Special Task Force arrested an accomplice of ‘Kanchipani Imran’ who is currently in the custody of the Dubai Police. The suspect was arrested in Kotahena along with a stock of 2.08 grams of ICE and a machete. The suspect, Mohammed Mohudeen Rahuman Raheema is a 43-year-old resident of Colombo 12. He was placed in remand custody until the 6th of this month after being produced before the court.
